text: Very good doctor, no other doctor has ever dedicated so much time to me. He approached the entire health situation holistically.
Very good specialist in the field of neurology
The doctor is a professional in his field. He conducted the examination, explained everything clearly, and prescribed treatment. Thank you.
Very thorough examination, the doctor's empathy, dedicating 90 minutes to the patient, full documentation after the examination

I can definitely recommend Mr. Jan to all patients. I have never encountered such an engaged doctor with an extremely analytical approach based on my medical history, medications prescribed by other specialists in the context of my paralysis symptoms. Most importantly, the correct diagnosis and referral to the hospital prevented the worsening of injuries. The entire 90 minutes of the doctor's intensive work with the patient was worth every penny spent. Thank you very much.
I thank Dr. Jan Kowalski for the time dedicated, professionalism, and providing medical support.
I recommend, the doctor thoroughly reviewed the medical documentation and conducted detailed patient examinations.

I sincerely recommend the doctor. The visit was very long, with a thorough examination, detailed interview, and in-depth analysis of results. I received a diagnosis, medications, and recommendations. The doctor is calm and cultured. Full professionalism.

The consultation was very comprehensive in an exemplary manner - detailed interview with various examinations, great doctor involvement. The visit card was accurately and clearly described - explanation of how to proceed, what tests to do next, issued referrals and prescription. Most importantly - already at this first consultation, measures were applied that helped significantly or even completely with dizziness (in my case it helped). Several days have passed since the consultation and these positive effects still persist. In summary, a very good neurologist, I am very grateful, I warmly recommend.

She has a very nice approach to children, explained everything, is very pro-human, I recommend to everyone and please don't be influenced by negative opinions because they don't match at all. I recommend :):
Engagement, professionalism, rich knowledge. The doctor is a great specialist! I recommend!

I've been coming to the doctor with my daughter for many years. Always competent, provides good advice, a great specialist. And all this is accompanied by a smile and empathy - simply a very nice woman. Recently, my daughter had a relapse of the disease after a remission period. The doctor patiently explained the test results and calmed our entire family. I am very grateful to her and recommend without hesitation!
I highly recommend the doctor. Engaged in the patient's matter. Helped me a lot with my disabled son. An empathetic and warm person and a high-class specialist.

I don't understand why someone decides to become a pediatric neurologist when they don't like children and treat parents with clear disrespect. My experience with the doctor was unfortunately unpleasant. This doctor doesn't explain diagnoses, avoids answering questions, and makes inappropriate comments. For example, she mentioned something about dying unvaccinated children, even though my daughter is vaccinated according to the schedule. Additionally, she unnecessarily commented on my lack of knowledge as a first-time parent, which was inappropriate.

I wanted my son's head examined because he had an indication of head asymmetry. For 300 z≈Ç I learned that my son indeed has head asymmetry and nothing else on the topic. On the plus side, I appreciate the doctor pointing out other health issues of my son.

Asking a 9-year-old about cocaine is a huge overstep. I won't let this go. Complete lack of any substantive approach. Only business-oriented. After comments like the child having bow legs, my daughter left crying

I saw negative comments regarding Ms. Anna. I think the caregiver should also engage and have insight into the patient's health status. Incomplete knowledge or providing inaccurate information to the doctor regarding symptoms or other significant information about the patient's health condition can directly affect the diagnosis and choice of further treatment method. I am very satisfied and the doctor herself is a concrete and substantive person. She dedicated 60 minutes to my child during the visit. First time I've seen such engagement! I recommend

The worst visit of my life. Total lack of empathy. An incorrect diagnosis that she verbally communicated to us was not confirmed during hospital examinations. Moreover, she ordered repeating costly examinations every two weeks, where the price of examinations with this doctor was much higher than in other places. Exposing to unnecessary and enormous costs and issuing referrals only for money. Sincerely not recommended!!!

This is my first review on this portal. Today was the worst visit of my life. I have never met such a rude, such an angry doctor who lacked minimal normal communication skills. We are refugees from Ukraine and maybe that's why this woman was so unpleasant to us, or maybe she is just a very unpleasant person in general. Either way, I cried on the way home because the entire meeting was pure horror and stress. During the visit, me and my husband, the biological father of the child, felt like spoiled students. The doctor either mocked us, made sharp, ironic remarks, or grabbed her head and lamented: "God, how you ruined this child, how bad everything is". And all this, mind you, with the child present! Then she incorrectly commented on the fact that the child doesn't live with the mother, and we had to explain why anyway. Although this is absolutely none of her business. There are no words to describe the whole situation, but we will be under terrible stress for a very long time.
Detailed interview and examination, referral for diagnostics and well-chosen pharmacological and rehabilitation treatment. Very nice approach to the patient, empathetic doctor, I warmly recommend
